therapeuticGoals.title: Emotional Regulation
therapeuticGoals.description: Develop greater capacity to identify, understand, and manage emotional responses

therapeuticGoals.title: Cognitive Flexibility
therapeuticGoals.description: Enhance ability to recognize and modify unhelpful thought patterns
approaches: CBT thought records and cognitive restructuring

therapeuticGoals.title: Interpersonal Effectiveness
therapeuticGoals.description: Improve communication, boundary-setting, and relationship skills
approaches: DBT DEAR MAN, GIVE, and FAST skills

therapeuticGoals.title: Distress Tolerance
therapeuticGoals.description: Build capacity to navigate difficult emotions without harmful coping

therapeuticGoals.title: Self-Compassion Development
therapeuticGoals.description: Foster kinder relationship with self, particularly during challenges

therapeuticGoals.title: Values Alignment
therapeuticGoals.description: Clarify personal values and develop behaviors aligned with them

therapeuticGoals.title: Mindfulness Practice
therapeuticGoals.description: Develop consistent mindfulness practice for present-moment awareness
approaches: Mindful observation of thoughts and feelings

therapeuticGoals.title: Behavioral Activation
therapeuticGoals.description: Increase engagement in rewarding and meaningful activities

therapeuticGoals.title: Trauma Processing
therapeuticGoals.description: Process traumatic experiences and reduce their impact on present functioning

clientSpecificGoals.title: Anxiety Management
clientSpecificGoals.description: Reduce frequency and intensity of anxiety symptoms
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Daily anxiety with physical symptoms and avoidance behaviors
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Manageable anxiety levels with effective coping strategies

clientSpecificGoals.title: Work-Life Balance
clientSpecificGoals.description: Develop healthier boundaries between work and personal life
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Working excessive hours with minimal self-care or leisure
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Balanced schedule with protected time for relationships and self-care

clientSpecificGoals.title: Grief Processing
clientSpecificGoals.description: Process recent loss and integrate grief experience
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Avoiding grief emotions and reminders of loss
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Ability to honor loss while engaging with life

clientSpecificGoals.title: Sleep Improvement
clientSpecificGoals.description: Establish healthy sleep patterns and improve sleep quality
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Irregular sleep schedule with frequent insomnia
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Consistent sleep routine with restorative rest

clientSpecificGoals.title: Assertiveness Development
clientSpecificGoals.description: Improve ability to express needs and set boundaries
clientSpecificGoals.currentState: Difficulty saying no and prioritizing others' needs
clientSpecificGoals.desiredState: Balanced assertiveness with respect for self and others
